languages.text: "Ты пытаешься проявить стоицизм?" {n}Улыбка нелюдя становится шире.{/n} "Хочешь испытать мои таланты? Сразу видно, что ты совсем не понимаешь, кто перед тобой. Я — хормейстер агонии". {n}Второй коготь, увенчанный тонкой и бесконечно острой иглой входит вам в лоб чуть выше переносицы, проникая сквозь кость словно сквозь воздух. Мгновение игла странствует по вашему мозгу, рождая в теле странные ощущения, а затем...{/n}

"Are you trying to be resilient?" {n}The xenos's smile grows wider.{/n} "Do you wish to put my talents to the test? You have not the slightest understanding of who stands before you. I am the choirmaster of agony." {n}A second claw, this one tipped with a thin and impossibly sharp needle, pierces your forehead slightly above the bridge of your nose, reaching through bone as easily as through air. For a few moments, the needle wanders inside your brain, causing strange sensations throughout your body, and then...{/n}
languages.original_text: "Ты пытаешься проявить стоицизм?" {n}Улыбка нелюдя становится шире.{/n} "Хочешь испытать мои таланты? Сразу видно, что ты совсем не понимаешь, кто перед тобой. Я — хормейстер агонии". {n}Второй коготь, увенчанный тонкой и бесконечно острой иглой входит вам в лоб чуть выше переносицы, проникая сквозь кость словно сквозь воздух. Мгновение игла странствует по вашему мозгу, рождая в теле странные ощущения, а затем...{/n}

languages.text: 「私の忍耐を試そうとしているのか？」{n}異種族の笑みが大きくなる。{/n}「私の才能を試してみたいと？お前は誰の前に立っているのか、全く理解していないようだな。私は苦悶の聖歌の主なのだぞ」{n}2本目の爪は先端が細く、驚くほどに鋭い針のようだった。それはあなたの鼻筋の少し上の額を貫き、まるで空気のように容易く骨を貫通した。しばらく、針はあなたの脳の内側を彷徨っては全身に奇妙な感覚を引き起こす。そして…{/n}
languages.original_text: "Are you trying to be resilient?" {n}The xenos's smile grows wider.{/n} "Do you wish to put my talents to the test? You have not the slightest understanding of who stands before you. I am the choirmaster of agony." {n}A second claw, this one tipped with a thin and impossibly sharp needle, pierces your forehead slightly above the bridge of your nose, reaching through bone as easily as through air. For a few moments, the needle wanders inside your brain, causing strange sensations throughout your body, and then...{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「私の忍耐を試そうとしているのか？」{n}異種族の笑みが大きくなる。{/n}「私の才能を試してみたいと？お前は誰の前に立っているのか、全く理解していないようだな。私は苦悶の聖歌の主なのだぞ」{n}2本目の爪は先端が細く、驚くほどに鋭い針のようだった。それはあなたの鼻筋の少し上の額を貫き、まるで空気のように容易く骨を貫通した。しばらく、針はあなたの脳の内側を彷徨っては全身に奇妙な感覚を引き起こす。そして…{/n}

languages.text: “你是打算忍住疼痛吗？”{n}血伶人的笑容变得更加灿烂了。{/n}“你是想考验一下我的才华吗？你恐怕根本不知道你面前的人是谁，我可是痛苦乐团的总指挥。”{n}血伶人伸出了另一只爪子，尖端带着一根锋利得难以置信的细针，刺穿了你鼻梁上方的额头。尖针轻而易举地刺穿了你的骨头，仿佛刺穿空气一般。针尖在你的大脑中游荡，在你的四肢百骸唤起了古怪的感觉，随后……{/n}
languages.original_text: "Are you trying to be resilient?" {n}The xenos's smile grows wider.{/n} "Do you wish to put my talents to the test? You have not the slightest understanding of who stands before you. I am the choirmaster of agony." {n}A second claw, this one tipped with a thin and impossibly sharp needle, pierces your forehead slightly above the bridge of your nose, reaching through bone as easily as through air. For a few moments, the needle wanders inside your brain, causing strange sensations throughout your body, and then...{/n}

traits.locale_text: “你是打算忍住疼痛吗？”{n}血伶人的笑容变得更加灿烂了。{/n}“你是想考验一下我的才华吗？你恐怕根本不知道你面前的人是谁，我可是痛苦乐团的总指挥。”{n}血伶人伸出了另一只爪子，尖端带着一根锋利得难以置信的细针，刺穿了你鼻梁上方的额头。尖针轻而易举地刺穿了你的骨头，仿佛刺穿空气一般。针尖在你的大脑中游荡，在你的四肢百骸唤起了古怪的感觉，随后……{/n}

languages.text: « Essayez-vous de résister ? {n}demande le xénos en souriant de plus belle.{/n} Vous comptez mettre mes talents à l'épreuve ? Vous ne comprenez vraiment pas à qui vous avez affaire. Je suis le maître d'orchestre de l'agonie. » {n}Une deuxième griffe, celle-ci dotée d'une aiguille incroyablement pointue, perce votre front juste au-dessus de votre nez et traverse votre crâne aussi facilement que de l'air. Pendant quelques instants, l'aiguille se balade dans votre cerveau et d'étranges sensations parcourent votre corps, puis...{/n}
languages.original_text: "Are you trying to be resilient?" {n}The xenos's smile grows wider.{/n} "Do you wish to put my talents to the test? You have not the slightest understanding of who stands before you. I am the choirmaster of agony." {n}A second claw, this one tipped with a thin and impossibly sharp needle, pierces your forehead slightly above the bridge of your nose, reaching through bone as easily as through air. For a few moments, the needle wanders inside your brain, causing strange sensations throughout your body, and then...{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Essayez-vous de résister ? {n}demande le xénos en souriant de plus belle.{/n} Vous comptez mettre mes talents à l'épreuve ? Vous ne comprenez vraiment pas à qui vous avez affaire. Je suis le maître d'orchestre de l'agonie. » {n}Une deuxième griffe, celle-ci dotée d'une aiguille incroyablement pointue, perce votre front juste au-dessus de votre nez et traverse votre crâne aussi facilement que de l'air. Pendant quelques instants, l'aiguille se balade dans votre cerveau et d'étranges sensations parcourent votre corps, puis...{/n}

languages.text: «¿Intentas ser resistente?». {n}La sonrisa del xenos se vuelve cada vez más ancha.{/n} «¿Quieres poner a prueba mis talentos? No tienes la más mínima idea de a quién tienes delante. Soy el maestro del coro de la agonía». {n}Una segunda garra, acabada en una aguja estrecha e imposiblemente afilada, pincha ligeramente tu frente por encima del puente de tu nariz. Atraviesa el hueso como si fuera aire. Por unos momentos, la aguja recorre tu cerebro, causando extrañas sensaciones en todo tu cuerpo, y...{/n}
languages.original_text: "Are you trying to be resilient?" {n}The xenos's smile grows wider.{/n} "Do you wish to put my talents to the test? You have not the slightest understanding of who stands before you. I am the choirmaster of agony." {n}A second claw, this one tipped with a thin and impossibly sharp needle, pierces your forehead slightly above the bridge of your nose, reaching through bone as easily as through air. For a few moments, the needle wanders inside your brain, causing strange sensations throughout your body, and then...{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¿Intentas ser resistente?». {n}La sonrisa del xenos se vuelve cada vez más ancha.{/n} «¿Quieres poner a prueba mis talentos? No tienes la más mínima idea de a quién tienes delante. Soy el maestro del coro de la agonía». {n}Una segunda garra, acabada en una aguja estrecha e imposiblemente afilada, pincha ligeramente tu frente por encima del puente de tu nariz. Atraviesa el hueso como si fuera aire. Por unos momentos, la aguja recorre tu cerebro, causando extrañas sensaciones en todo tu cuerpo, y...{/n}

languages.text: "Versucht Ihr, widerstandsfähig zu sein?" {n}Das Lächeln des Xenos wird breiter.{/n} "Wollt Ihr meine Talente auf die Probe stellen? Ihr habt nicht die geringste Ahnung, wer vor Euch steht. Ich bin der Chormeister des Schmerzes." {n}Eine zweite Klaue mit einer dünnen und unfassbar scharfen Nadel an der Spitze bohrt sich dicht über deinem Nasenrücken in deine Stirn und durchdringt deinen Knochen, als wäre er Luft. Die Nadel wandert eine Weile dich dein Gehirn, weckt in deinem Körper seltsame Empfindungen und dann ...{/n}
languages.original_text: "Are you trying to be resilient?" {n}The xenos's smile grows wider.{/n} "Do you wish to put my talents to the test? You have not the slightest understanding of who stands before you. I am the choirmaster of agony." {n}A second claw, this one tipped with a thin and impossibly sharp needle, pierces your forehead slightly above the bridge of your nose, reaching through bone as easily as through air. For a few moments, the needle wanders inside your brain, causing strange sensations throughout your body, and then...{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Versucht Ihr, widerstandsfähig zu sein?" {n}Das Lächeln des Xenos wird breiter.{/n} "Wollt Ihr meine Talente auf die Probe stellen? Ihr habt nicht die geringste Ahnung, wer vor Euch steht. Ich bin der Chormeister des Schmerzes." {n}Eine zweite Klaue mit einer dünnen und unfassbar scharfen Nadel an der Spitze bohrt sich dicht über deinem Nasenrücken in deine Stirn und durchdringt deinen Knochen, als wäre er Luft. Die Nadel wandert eine Weile dich dein Gehirn, weckt in deinem Körper seltsame Empfindungen und dann ...{/n}

languages.text: "Dirayetli olmaya mı çalışıyorsun?" {n}Zenonun gülümsemesi daha da genişliyor.{/n} "Kabiliyetlerimi sınamamı mı istiyorsun? Karşında duranın kim olduğu konusunda en ufak bir fikrin bile yok. Ben ızdırabın orkestra şefiyim." {n}Bu kez ince ve akıl almaz derecede sivri bir iğneye sahip ikinci bir pençe; burun kemiğinin birazcık üzerinden alnına giriyor, kemiği havayı deler gibi kolayca aşıyor. İğne kısa bir süre beyninin içinde dolanıp bedeninde tuhaf hisler meydana getiriyor, ardından...{/n}
languages.original_text: "Are you trying to be resilient?" {n}The xenos's smile grows wider.{/n} "Do you wish to put my talents to the test? You have not the slightest understanding of who stands before you. I am the choirmaster of agony." {n}A second claw, this one tipped with a thin and impossibly sharp needle, pierces your forehead slightly above the bridge of your nose, reaching through bone as easily as through air. For a few moments, the needle wanders inside your brain, causing strange sensations throughout your body, and then...{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Dirayetli olmaya mı çalışıyorsun?" {n}Zenonun gülümsemesi daha da genişliyor.{/n} "Kabiliyetlerimi sınamamı mı istiyorsun? Karşında duranın kim olduğu konusunda en ufak bir fikrin bile yok. Ben ızdırabın orkestra şefiyim." {n}Bu kez ince ve akıl almaz derecede sivri bir iğneye sahip ikinci bir pençe, burun kemiğinin birazcık üzerinden alnına giriyor, kemiği havayı deler gibi kolayca aşıyor. İğne kısa bir süre beyninin içinde dolanıyor, bedeninde tuhaf hisler meydana getiriyor, ardından...{/n}
